main.name: Johnny
main.description: software developer with 2 years of experience in fast-paced, deadline-driven environment. Highly experienced in the software development lifecycle. Supportive and enthusiastic team player dedicated to efficiently resolving project issues. Ability and willingness to innovate and learn new technologies, quick learner passionate about development
main.bio: Hi! I'm Johnny. I'm currently studying Software Engineering Technology in Centennial College and also currently working in WIMTACH. I love to learn new technologies and create something new. Nowadays, I'm into solving algorithm questoins
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: I've learned object-oriented software design methodologies, user-oriented interface design, software testing and QA, C#, Java, Java EE, Oracle, MS-SQL server, UNIX/Linux, Python, Microsoft's ASP.NET Core, HTML5/JavaScript/Angular, mobile application development, emerging web frameworks, cloud computing, data mining and more.

work.title: Front-End Developer
work.description:
Refactoring AngularJS to Angular for better performance with TypeScript in Agile environment. 
Creating and maintaining 100% coverage unit testing each service and component with Jest in Test-Driven Development 
Providing proof of concept to replace deprecated third party libraries. 
experiencing with all the phases of SDLC and agile development methodologies including SCRUM, involved in daily SCRUM meetings to keep track of the ongoing project status and issues using JIRA

work.title: Lead Developer
work.description:
Led student researchers and demonstrated progress bi-weekly to clients 
Professional experience in mobile app development using React Native and Redux framework from scratch 
Implemented video and voice call for web(Angular) to mobile and mobile to mobile using WebRTC(peer-to-peer communication) 
Developed push notification for IOS and Android utilizing OneSignal which based on firebase in ASP.NET 
Managed quality of React Native as a code owner using Jira,Trello board (Agile tools) and Git (Version Control)

work.title: QA Engineer
work.description:
Wrote and maintained Selenium Web Driver(TestNG) automated regression test cases for Angular 
Conducted regression testing and analyzed results and submitted observations to development team

work.title: Full-Stack Developer
work.description:
Refactored ASP.NET code to feature enhancement & performance improvement (20 â€“ 30% faster) 
Created new feature using google map 
Participated in restructuring and migrating database for CRM solution (DB Migration /DB Design)

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
